plot: Young school boy Akira Fudo and his father travel to the Himalayas on vacation and his father is killed. Akira is then possessed by Devilman in attempt to bring misery and torment to humans...
plot_en: Young school boy Akira Fudo and his father travel to the Himalayas on vacation and his father is killed. Akira is then possessed by Devilman in attempt to bring misery and torment to humans...

title: Debiruman
